Description: The United States reached a settlement with NetApp Inc. and NetApp U.S. Public Sector Inc. on false claims and contract fraud claims under which NetApp agreed to pay $128 million, plus interest.

Info Source: from a spreadsheet posted on the FAA website at https://www.faa.gov/about/office_org/headquarters_offices/ash/ash_programs/hazmat/compliance_enforcement/

Description: failure to pay out-of-state business registration fee
